sub_topic: Calculating the volume of a rectangular pyramid.
message_1: A rectangular pyramid has a length of 7 cm, width of 5 cm, and a height of 9 cm. Calculate the volume of the rectangular pyramid.
message_2:
To calculate the volume of a rectangular pyramid, we use the formula:

Volume = (1/3) * length * width * height

Given the dimensions of the pyramid are length = 7 cm, width = 5 cm, and height = 9 cm, we can plug these values into the formula:

Volume = (1/3) * 7 * 5 * 9
Volume = (1/3) * 315
Volume = 105 cubic centimeters

The volume of the rectangular pyramid is 105 cubic centimeters.
